title: Is the U.S. about to lose its financial crown to China? Coinbase CEO sounds the alarm
description: In a recent op-ed for MarketWatch, Brian Armstrong, CEO of Coinbase, highlighted the potential risks of restrictive cryptocurrency policies in the U.S. Armstrong cautioned that considering the recent volatility in crypto markets, policymakers might be inclined to dismiss cryptocurrencies as an unstable asset class. title: Polygon (MATIC), Monero (XMR) & TMS Network (TMSN) are Thriving! But can Anybody take Bitcoin’s Throne?
description: Bitcoin (BTC) holds the distinction of being the progenitor of all cryptocurrencies, serving as their foundation. Absent Bitcoin, cryptocurrencies such as Polygon (MATIC), Monero (XMR), or the more recent TMS Network (TMSN) would not have come into existence. Technological advancements typically usher in newer and swifter alternatives, supplanting established systems, but can this phenomenon extend […]

title: Philcoin CEO Jerry Lopez on Utilizing Blockchain to Revolutionize Philanthropic Giving
description:
Entrepreneur, philanthropist, and pastor Jerry Lopez has helped philanthropic organizations in more than 50 countries and positively impacted the lives of thousands. Presently serving as Philcoin’s CEO and Founder, he is leveraging the power of blockchain to transform digital giving.
